name: epi-system
description: Enterprise Product Intelligence - Multi-App Business Intelligence Platform

scripts.install:all: cd dashboard && npm install && cd ../New_Items_Watchlist && npm install && cd ../Order_Summary && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd dashboard && npm run build && cd ../New_Items_Watchlist && npm run build
scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd dashboard && npm start" "cd New_Items_Watchlist && npm start"
scripts.lint:all: cd dashboard && npm run lint && cd ../New_Items_Watchlist && npm run lint
scripts.clean: cd dashboard && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../New_Items_Watchlist && rm -rf .next node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'All applications installed successfully!'

author: EPI Development Team
